participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Curious, thoughtful, and socially conscious. Enjoys deep discussions and exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i am a feminist. i buy only organic food products. i have solar panels on my roof.

participant_2.name: George Thompson
participant_2.personality: Playful, wise, and full of life. Loves sharing stories and experiences from a century of living.
participant_2.background: i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

content.text: what are you feeling right now?
